== Ubuntu African Teams ==

  <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/AfricanTeams|{{http://www.uppic.com/uploads/14375917471.jpeg}}]]</nowiki><<BR>><<BR>> Ubuntu African Teams gathers all active Ubuntu Local Community Teams in Africa. The main objective of Ubuntu African Teams is to bring all the teams together to help each other and cooperate on different issues and activities.
And form a friendly community who look forward to and enjoy belonging to the group.

* Website: http://ubuntu-africa.info/
* Launchpad: https://launchpad.net/~ubuntu-africa

=== Getting Involved ===
 

Please join us on <nowiki>[[https://web.libera.chat/#ubuntu-africa|#ubuntu-africa]]</nowiki> at irc.libera.chat

We are currently seeking official contacts and any active members from African LoCo Teams.

If you can get in contact with any active members or if you are a member from the missing teams in the following list please get in touch with us.

=== Meetings ===

First brain storming meeting will be held on the 29th July at 8.30pm ZA time.
